rooms.description: Spacious entrance with ample natural light, designed to align with Vastu principles emphasizing positive energy flow. West-facing window enhances morning brightness.

Large living area adjacent to the garden; incorporates traditional Chettinad architecture elements such as intricate wood carvings and stone finishes, ensuring ample space for joint family gatherings.
Connected to the living room with a semi-open design; features large West-facing windows for enhanced morning light in line with Vastu.
Functional kitchen designed with modern appliances and traditional Chettinad elements such as tiled backsplash, ensuring efficient flow and ample space for cooking.
Spacious master bedroom with an attached bathroom; incorporates privacy screens and natural light, aligning with Vastu principles by placing the bed in the north-east direction.
Well-appointed guest room designed for joint family usage, ensuring accessibility and ease of movement; includes natural ventilation and lighting.
Additional guest bedroom to accommodate extended family visits, featuring traditional Chettinad design with modern amenities.
Quiet study or work area located away from noise; designed with ample natural light and ventilation for productivity.
Functional storage space integrated into the ground floor, ensuring seamless organization of household essentials.

openings.details: Large reinforced door with traditional carved wooden design aligning with Chettinad style, positioned to face the garden for an inviting approach.
Large windows ensuring ample morning light in line with Vastu principles, strategically placed across multiple rooms.
Direct access to the swimming pool area; designed for easy movement between the indoor and outdoor spaces.

rooms.description: Expansive master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom; features a private balcony for relaxation and morning sunlight.
Additional guest bedroom designed with modern amenities while preserving Chettinad architectural details.
Functional bedroom to serve as either a study or family room, offering privacy and comfort for joint family members.
Shared balcony space providing an outdoor living area with views of the garden and swimming pool; designed to facilitate family gatherings.
Additional bathroom for convenience in a multi-bedroom layout, ensuring accessibility across the villa.

openings.details: Windows to ensure natural light and proper ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles of energy flow on upper levels.
Doorway leading to the balcony/veranda for outdoor relaxation and family gatherings.
